name: BlueCollarBourbon
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you're like us at all, you can't stand all of the whiskey related shows that talk about 'hints of santa clause melon', or 'notes of coastal breeze'. On every episode we blind taste test two affordable bottles of whiskey, bourbon or rye and let you know what we think. Except, we don't use pretentious adjectives that should only be used when describing wine. Everyday bourbon reviews for the everyday bourbon fan.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
